name: curtains-extension
description: Block distracting websites with a peaceful curtain overlay. Get motivated, stay focused, and control your browsing time.

scripts.package: DATETIME=$(date +%Y_%m_%d_%H_%M_%S) && SEMVER=$(date +%Y.%-m%d.%-H%M%S) && npm version $SEMVER --no-git-tag-version --allow-same-version && vite build && git add -A && git commit -m "release: $DATETIME" && mkdir -p release && cd dist && zip -r ../release/curtains-$DATETIME.zip . -x '*.vite*' -x '*__MACOSX*' -x '*.DS_Store*' && cd .. && echo "Package created: release/curtains-$DATETIME.zip"

author: JeromeGsq
